name: percona
description: Installs Percona MySQL client and server

recipes.percona::package_repo: Sets up the package repository and installs dependent packages
recipes.percona::backup: Installs the XtraBackup hot backup software
recipes.percona::cluster: Installs the Percona XtraDB Cluster server components
recipes.percona::configure_server: Used internally to manage the server configuration.
recipes.percona::replication: Used internally to grant permissions for replication.
recipes.percona::access_grants: Used internally to grant permissions for recipes
